scripts.cypress:run:tags: cypress run --config-file cypress.json --browser chrome --record --key 2c2fb7fa-c8d4-40dd-8d70-7dd635673f --env TAGS="@smoke-test" ||  exit 0
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /q /s allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos
scripts.cy:run:generate:report: npm run allure:clear && npm run cypress:runHeadless  && allure serve
scripts.cy:smoke:generate:report: npm run allure:clear && npm run cypress:run:tags && allure serve
